00075 char *progname;
00076 int verbose = 1;
00077 int version;
00078 static int print_only = 0;
00079 
00080 #ifdef HAVE_LDISKFS_OSD
00081 #define FSLIST_LDISKFS "ldiskfs"
00082 #define HAVE_FSLIST
00083 #else
00084  #define FSLIST_LDISKFS ""
00085 #endif /* HAVE_LDISKFS_OSD */
00086 #ifdef HAVE_ZFS_OSD
00087  #ifdef HAVE_FSLIST
00088    #define FSLIST_ZFS "|zfs"
00089  #else
00090   #define FSLIST_ZFS "zfs"
00091   #define HAVE_FSLIST
00092  #endif
00093 #else
00094  #define FSLIST_ZFS ""
00095 #endif /* HAVE_ZFS_OSD */
00096 
00097 #ifndef HAVE_FSLIST
00098  #error "no backing OSD types (ldiskfs or ZFS) are configured"
00099 #endif
00100 
00101 #define FSLIST FSLIST_LDISKFS FSLIST_ZFS
00102 
00103 void usage(FILE *out)
00104 {
00105         fprintf(out, "usage: %s <target type> [--backfstype="FSLIST"] "
00106                 "--fsname=<filesystem name>\n"
00107                 "\t--index=<target index> [options] <device>\n", progname);
00108 #ifdef HAVE_ZFS_OSD
00109         fprintf(out, "usage: %s <target type> --backfstype=zfs "
00110                 "--fsname=<filesystem name> [options]\n"
00111                 "\t<pool name>/<dataset name>\n"
00112                 "\t[[<vdev type>] <device> [<device> ...] [vdev type>] ...]\n",
00113                 progname);
00114 #endif
00115         fprintf(out,
00116                 "\t<device>:block device or file (e.g /dev/sda or /tmp/ost1)\n"
00117 #ifdef HAVE_ZFS_OSD
00118                 "\t<pool name>: name of ZFS pool where target is created "
00119                         "(e.g. tank)\n"
00120                 "\t<dataset name>: name of new dataset, must be unique within "
00121                         "pool (e.g. ost1)\n"
00122                 "\t<vdev type>: type of vdev (mirror, raidz, raidz2, spare, "
00123                         "cache, log)\n"
00124 #endif
00125                 "\n"
00126 #ifndef TUNEFS
00127                 "\ttarget types:\n"
00128                 "\t\t--mgs: configuration management service\n"
00129                 "\t\t--mdt: metadata storage, mutually exclusive with ost\n"
00130                 "\t\t--ost: object storage, mutually exclusive with mdt, mgs\n"
00131 #endif
00132                 "\toptions (in order of popularity):\n"
00133                 "\t\t--index=#N: numerical target index (0..N)\n"
00134                 "\t\t\trequired for all targets other than the MGS,\n"
00135                 "\t\t\ttarget index may either be a decimal number or\n"
00136                 "\t\t\thexadecimal number starting with '0x'\n"
00137                 "\t\t--fsname=<8_char_filesystem_name>: fs targets belong to\n"
00138                 "\t\t\trequired for all targets other than MGS\n"
00139                 "\t\t--mgsnode=<nid>[,<...>]: NID(s) of remote MGS\n"
00140                 "\t\t\trequired for all targets other than MGS\n"
00141                 "\t\t--mountfsoptions=<opts>: permanent Lustre mount options\n"
00142                 "\t\t--backfs-mount-opts=<opts>: backing fs mount options\n"
00143                 "\t\t--failnode=<nid>[,<...>]: NID(s) of backup failover node\n"
00144                 "\t\t\tmutually exclusive with --servicenode\n"
00145                 "\t\t--servicenode=<nid>[,<...>]: NID(s) of service partners\n"
00146                 "\t\t\ttreat nodes as equal service node, mutually exclusive "
00147                         "with --failnode\n"
00148                 "\t\t--param <key>=<value>: set a permanent parameter\n"
00149                 "\t\t\te.g. --param sys.timeout=40\n"
00150                 "\t\t\t     --param lov.stripesize=2M\n"
00151                 "\t\t--network=<net>[,<...>]: restrict OST/MDT to network(s)\n"
00152 #ifndef TUNEFS
00153                 "\t\t--backfstype=<fstype>: backing fs type (ldiskfs, zfs)\n"
00154                 "\t\t--device-size=#N(KB): device size for loop devices\n"
00155                 "\t\t--mkfsoptions=<opts>: format options\n"
00156                 "\t\t--reformat: overwrite an existing disk\n"
00157                 "\t\t--replace: replace an old target with the same index\n"
00158                 "\t\t--stripe-count-hint=#N: for optimizing MDT inode size\n"
00159 #else
00160                 "\t\t--erase-params: erase all old parameter settings\n"
00161                 "\t\t--nomgs: turn off MGS service on this MDT\n"
00162                 "\t\t--writeconf: erase all config logs for this fs.\n"
00163                 "\t\t--quota: enable space accounting on old 2.x device.\n"
00164 #endif
00165                 "\t\t--comment=<user comment>: arbitrary string (%d bytes)\n"
00166                 "\t\t--dryrun: report what we would do; don't write to disk\n"
00167                 "\t\t--verbose: e.g. show mkfs progress\n"
00168                 "\t\t-V|--version: output build version of the utility and\n"
00169                 "\t\t\texit\n"
00170                 "\t\t--quiet\n",
00171                 (int)sizeof(((struct lustre_disk_data *)0)->ldd_userdata));
00172         return;
00173 }
00174 
00175 /* ==================== Lustre config functions =============*/
00176 
00177 void print_ldd(char *str, struct lustre_disk_data *ldd)
00178 {
00179         printf("\n   %s:\n", str);
00180         printf("Target:     %s\n", ldd->ldd_svname);
00181         if (ldd->ldd_svindex == INDEX_UNASSIGNED)
00182                 printf("Index:      unassigned\n");
00183         else
00184                 printf("Index:      %d\n", ldd->ldd_svindex);
00185         if (ldd->ldd_uuid[0])
00186                 printf("UUID:       %s\n", (char *)ldd->ldd_uuid);
00187         printf("Lustre FS:  %s\n", ldd->ldd_fsname);
00188         printf("Mount type: %s\n", MT_STR(ldd));
00189         printf("Flags:      %#x\n", ldd->ldd_flags);
00190         printf("              (%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s)\n",
00191                IS_MDT(ldd) ? "MDT ":"",
00192                IS_OST(ldd) ? "OST ":"",
00193                IS_MGS(ldd) ? "MGS ":"",
00194                ldd->ldd_flags & LDD_F_NEED_INDEX ? "needs_index ":"",
00195                ldd->ldd_flags & LDD_F_VIRGIN     ? "first_time ":"",
00196                ldd->ldd_flags & LDD_F_UPDATE     ? "update ":"",
00197                ldd->ldd_flags & LDD_F_WRITECONF  ? "writeconf ":"",
00198                ldd->ldd_flags & LDD_F_NO_PRIMNODE? "no_primnode ":"",
00199                ldd->ldd_flags & LDD_F_UPGRADE14  ? "upgrade1.4 ":"");
00200         printf("Persistent mount opts: %s\n", ldd->ldd_mount_opts);
00201         printf("Parameters:%s\n", ldd->ldd_params);
00202         if (ldd->ldd_userdata[0])
00203                 printf("Comment: %s\n", ldd->ldd_userdata);
00204         printf("\n");
00205 }
00206 
00207 void set_defaults(struct mkfs_opts *mop)
00208 {
00209         mop->mo_ldd.ldd_magic = LDD_MAGIC;
00210         mop->mo_ldd.ldd_config_ver = 1;
00211         mop->mo_ldd.ldd_flags = LDD_F_NEED_INDEX | LDD_F_UPDATE | LDD_F_VIRGIN;
00212 #ifdef HAVE_LDISKFS_OSD
00213         mop->mo_ldd.ldd_mount_type = LDD_MT_LDISKFS;
00214 #else
00215         mop->mo_ldd.ldd_mount_type = LDD_MT_ZFS;
00216 #endif
00217         mop->mo_ldd.ldd_svindex = INDEX_UNASSIGNED;
00218         mop->mo_mgs_failnodes = 0;
00219         mop->mo_stripe_count = 1;
00220         mop->mo_pool_vdevs = NULL;
00221 }
00222 
00223 static inline void badopt(const char *opt, char *type)
00224 {
00225         fprintf(stderr, "%s: '--%s' only valid for %s\n",
00226                 progname, opt, type);
00227         usage(stderr);
00228 }
00229 
00230 /* from mount_lustre */
00231 /* Get rid of symbolic hostnames for tcp, since kernel can't do lookups */
00232 #define MAXNIDSTR 1024
00233 static char *convert_hostnames(char *s1)
00234 {
00235         char *converted, *s2 = 0, *c, *end, sep;
00236         int left = MAXNIDSTR;
00237         lnet_nid_t nid;
00238 
00239         converted = malloc(left);
00240         if (converted == NULL) {
00241                 return NULL;
00242         }
00243 
00244         end = s1 + strlen(s1);
00245         c = converted;
00246         while ((left > 0) && (s1 < end)) {
00247                 s2 = strpbrk(s1, ",:");
00248                 if (!s2)
00249                         s2 = end;
00250                 sep = *s2;
00251                 *s2 = '\0';
00252                 nid = libcfs_str2nid(s1);
00253                 *s2 = sep;
00254 
00255                 if (nid == LNET_NID_ANY) {
00256                         fprintf(stderr, "%s: Cannot resolve hostname '%s'.\n",
00257                                 progname, s1);
00258                         free(converted);
00259                         return NULL;
00260                 }
00261                 if (strncmp(libcfs_nid2str(nid), "127.0.0.1",
00262                             strlen("127.0.0.1")) == 0) {
00263                         fprintf(stderr, "%s: The NID '%s' resolves to the "
00264                                 "loopback address '%s'.  Lustre requires a "
00265                                 "non-loopback address.\n",
00266                                 progname, s1, libcfs_nid2str(nid));
00267                         free(converted);
00268                         return NULL;
00269                 }
00270 
00271                 c += snprintf(c, left, "%s%c", libcfs_nid2str(nid), sep);
00272                 left = converted + MAXNIDSTR - c;
00273                 s1 = s2 + 1;
00274         }
00275         return converted;
00276 }
00277 
00278 int parse_opts(int argc, char *const argv[], struct mkfs_opts *mop,
00279                char **mountopts)
00280 {
00281         static struct option long_opt[] = {
00282                 { "backfs-mount-opts",  required_argument,      NULL, 'B' },
00283                 { "failnode",           required_argument,      NULL, 'f' },
00284                 { "failover",           required_argument,      NULL, 'f' },
00285                 { "help",               no_argument,            NULL, 'h' },
00286                 { "index",              required_argument,      NULL, 'i' },
00287                 { "fsname",             required_argument,      NULL, 'L' },
00288                 { "mgsnode",            required_argument,      NULL, 'm' },
00289                 { "mgsnid",             required_argument,      NULL, 'm' },
00290                 { "dryrun",             no_argument,            NULL, 'n' },
00291                 { "mountfsoptions",     required_argument,      NULL, 'o' },
00292                 { "param",              required_argument,      NULL, 'p' },
00293                 { "quiet",              no_argument,            NULL, 'q' },
00294                 { "servicenode",        required_argument,      NULL, 's' },
00295                 { "network",            required_argument,      NULL, 't' },
00296                 { "comment",            required_argument,      NULL, 'u' },
00297                 { "verbose",            no_argument,            NULL, 'v' },
00298                 { "version",            no_argument,            NULL, 'V' },
00299 #ifndef TUNEFS
00300                 { "backfstype",         required_argument,      NULL, 'b' },
00301                 { "stripe-count-hint",  required_argument,      NULL, 'c' },
00302                 { "device-size",        required_argument,      NULL, 'd' },
00303                 { "mgs",                no_argument,            NULL, 'G' },
00304                 { "mkfsoptions",        required_argument,      NULL, 'k' },
00305                 { "mdt",                no_argument,            NULL, 'M' },
00306                 { "nomgs",              no_argument,            NULL, 'N' },
00307                 { "ost",                no_argument,            NULL, 'O' },
00308                 { "reformat",           no_argument,            NULL, 'r' },
00309                 { "replace",            no_argument,            NULL, 'R' },
00310 #else
00311                 { "erase-params",       no_argument,            NULL, 'e' },
00312                 { "quota",              no_argument,            NULL, 'Q' },
00313                 { "writeconf",          no_argument,            NULL, 'w' },
00314 #endif
00315                 { 0,                    0,                      NULL,  0  }
00316         };
00317         char *optstring = "B:f:hi:L:m:no:p:qs:t:u:vV"
00318 #ifndef TUNEFS
00319                           "b:c:d:Gk:MNOrR";
00320 #else
00321                           "eQw";
00322 #endif
00323         struct lustre_disk_data *ldd = &mop->mo_ldd;
00324         char new_fsname[16] = { 0 };
00325         int opt;
00326         int rc, longidx;
00327         int failnode_set = 0, servicenode_set = 0;
00328         int replace = 0;
00329         bool index_option = false;
00330 
00331         while ((opt = getopt_long(argc, argv, optstring, long_opt, &longidx)) !=
00332                EOF) {
00333                 switch (opt) {
00334                 case 'B':
00335                         mop->mo_mountopts = optarg;
00336                         break;
00337                 case 'f':
00338                 case 's': {
00339                         char *nids;
00340 
00341                         if ((opt == 'f' && servicenode_set) ||
00342                             (opt == 's' && failnode_set)) {
00343                                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: %s cannot use with --%s\n",
00344                                         progname, long_opt[longidx].name,
00345                                         opt == 'f' ? "servicenode" :
00346                                         "failnode");
00347                                 return 1;
00348                         }
00349 
00350                         nids = convert_hostnames(optarg);
00351                         if (nids == NULL)
00352                                 return 1;
00353 
00354                         rc = append_param(ldd->ldd_params, PARAM_FAILNODE,
00355                                           nids, ':');
00356                         free(nids);
00357                         if (rc != 0)
00358                                 return rc;
00359 
00360                         /* Must update the mgs logs */
00361                         ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_UPDATE;
00362                         if (opt == 'f') {
00363                                 failnode_set = 1;
00364                         } else {
00365                                 ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_NO_PRIMNODE;
00366                                 servicenode_set = 1;
00367                         }
00368                         mop->mo_flags |= MO_FAILOVER;
00369                         break;
00370                 }
00371                 case 'h':
00372                         usage(stdout);
00373                         return 1;
00374                 case 'i': {
00375                         char *endptr = NULL;
00376                         int base;
00377                         index_option = true;
00378                         /* LU-2374: check whether it is OST/MDT later */
00379                         base = (strlen(optarg) > 1 &&
00380                                 !strncmp(optarg, "0x", 2)) ? 16 : 10;
00381                         /* Allowed input are base 16 and base 10 numbers only */
00382                         mop->mo_ldd.ldd_svindex = strtoul(optarg,
00383                                                           &endptr, base);
00384                         if (*endptr != '\0') {
00385                                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: wrong index %s. "
00386                                         "Target index must be decimal or "
00387                                         "hexadecimal.\n",
00388                                         progname, optarg);
00389                                 return 1;
00390                         }
00391                         if (ldd->ldd_svindex >= INDEX_UNASSIGNED) {
00392                                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: wrong index %u. "
00393                                         "Target index must be less than %u.\n",
00394                                         progname, ldd->ldd_svindex,
00395                                         INDEX_UNASSIGNED);
00396                                 return 1;
00397                         }
00398 
00399                         ldd->ldd_flags &= ~LDD_F_NEED_INDEX;
00400                         break;
00401                 }
00402                 case 'L': {
00403                         rc = lustre_is_fsname_valid(optarg, 1,
00404                                                     LUSTRE_MAXFSNAME);
00405                         if (rc < 0) {
00406                                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: filesystem name must be "
00407                                         "1-%d chars\n", progname,
00408                                         LUSTRE_MAXFSNAME);
00409                                 return 1;
00410                         } else if (rc > 0) {
00411                                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: char '%c' not allowed in "
00412                                         "filesystem name\n", progname, rc);
00413                                 return 1;
00414                         }
00415 
00416                         strscpy(new_fsname, optarg, sizeof(new_fsname));
00417                         break;
00418                 }
00419                 case 'm': {
00420                         char *nids = convert_hostnames(optarg);
00421 
00422                         if (nids == NULL)
00423                                 return 1;
00424 
00425                         rc = append_param(ldd->ldd_params, PARAM_MGSNODE,
00426                                           nids, ':');
00427                         free(nids);
00428                         if (rc != 0)
00429                                 return rc;
00430 
00431                         mop->mo_mgs_failnodes++;
00432                         break;
00433                 }
00434                 case 'n':
00435                         print_only++;
00436                         break;
00437                 case 'o':
00438                         *mountopts = optarg;
00439                         break;
00440                 case 'p':
00441                         rc = add_param(ldd->ldd_params, NULL, optarg);
00442                         if (rc != 0)
00443                                 return rc;
00444 
00445                         /* Must update the mgs logs */
00446                         ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_UPDATE;
00447                         break;
00448                 case 'q':
00449                         verbose--;
00450                         break;
00451                 case 't':
00452                         if (!IS_MDT(ldd) && !IS_OST(ldd)) {
00453                                 badopt(long_opt[longidx].name, "MDT,OST");
00454                                 return 1;
00455                         }
00456 
00457                         if (optarg == NULL)
00458                                 return 1;
00459 
00460                         rc = add_param(ldd->ldd_params, PARAM_NETWORK, optarg);
00461                         if (rc != 0)
00462                                 return rc;
00463 
00464                         /* Must update the mgs logs */
00465                         ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_UPDATE;
00466                         break;
00467                 case 'u':
00468                         strscpy(ldd->ldd_userdata, optarg,
00469                                 sizeof(ldd->ldd_userdata));
00470                         break;
00471                 case 'v':
00472                         verbose++;
00473                         break;
00474                 case 'V':
00475                         ++version;
00476                         fprintf(stdout, "%s %s\n", progname,
00477                                 LUSTRE_VERSION_STRING);
00478                         return 0;
00479 #ifndef TUNEFS
00480                 case 'b': {
00481                         int i = 0;
00482 
00483                         do {
00484                                 if (strcmp(optarg, mt_str(i)) == 0) {
00485                                         ldd->ldd_mount_type = i;
00486                                         break;
00487                                 }
00488                         } while (++i < LDD_MT_LAST);
00489 
00490                         if (i == LDD_MT_LAST) {
00491                                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: invalid backend filesystem"
00492                                         " type %s\n", progname, optarg);
00493                                 return 1;
00494                         }
00495                         break;
00496                 }
00497                 case 'c':
00498                         if (IS_MDT(ldd)) {
00499                                 int stripe_count = atol(optarg);
00500 
00501                                 if (stripe_count <= 0) {
00502                                         fprintf(stderr, "%s: bad stripe count "
00503                                                 "%d\n", progname, stripe_count);
00504                                         return 1;
00505                                 }
00506                                 mop->mo_stripe_count = stripe_count;
00507                         } else {
00508                                 badopt(long_opt[longidx].name, "MDT");
00509                                 return 1;
00510                         }
00511                         break;
00512                 case 'd':
00513                         mop->mo_device_kb = atol(optarg);
00514                         break;
00515                 case 'G':
00516                         ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MGS;
00517                         break;
00518                 case 'k':
00519                         strscpy(mop->mo_mkfsopts, optarg,
00520                                 sizeof(mop->mo_mkfsopts));
00521                         break;
00522                 case 'M':
00523                         ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MDT;
00524                         break;
00525                 case 'N':
00526                         ldd->ldd_flags &= ~LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MGS;
00527                         break;
00528                 case 'O':
00529                         ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_SV_TYPE_OST;
00530                         break;
00531                 case 'r':
00532                         mop->mo_flags |= MO_FORCEFORMAT;
00533                         break;
00534                 case 'R':
00535                         replace = 1;
00536                         break;
00537 #else /* !TUNEFS */
00538                 case 'e':
00539                         ldd->ldd_params[0] = '\0';
00540                         /* Must update the mgs logs */
00541                         ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_UPDATE;
00542                         break;
00543                 case 'Q':
00544                         mop->mo_flags |= MO_QUOTA;
00545                         break;
00546                 case 'w':
00547                         ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_WRITECONF;
00548                         break;
00549 #endif /* !TUNEFS */
00550                 default:
00551                         if (opt != '?') {
00552                                 fatal();
00553                                 fprintf(stderr, "Unknown option '%c'\n", opt);
00554                         }
00555                         return EINVAL;
00556                 }
00557         }
00558 
00559         if (strlen(new_fsname) > 0) {
00560                 if (!(mop->mo_flags & MO_FORCEFORMAT) &&
00561                      (!(ldd->ldd_flags &
00562                         (LDD_F_UPGRADE14 | LDD_F_VIRGIN | LDD_F_WRITECONF)))) {
00563                         fprintf(stderr, "%s: cannot change the name "
00564                                 "of a registered target\n", progname);
00565                         return 1;
00566                 }
00567 
00568                 strscpy(ldd->ldd_fsname, new_fsname, sizeof(ldd->ldd_fsname));
00569         }
00570 
00571         if (index_option && !(mop->mo_ldd.ldd_flags &
00572               (LDD_F_UPGRADE14 | LDD_F_VIRGIN |
00573                LDD_F_WRITECONF))) {
00574                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: cannot change the index of"
00575                         " a registered target\n", progname);
00576                 return 1;
00577         }
00578 
00579         /* Need to clear this flag after parsing 'L' and 'i' options. */
00580         if (replace)
00581                 ldd->ldd_flags &= ~LDD_F_VIRGIN;
00582 
00583         if (optind == argc) {
00584                 /* The user didn't specify device name */
00585                 fatal();
00586                 fprintf(stderr, "Not enough arguments - device name or "
00587                         "pool/dataset name not specified.\n");
00588                 return EINVAL;
00589         } else {
00590                 /*  The device or pool/filesystem name */
00591                 strscpy(mop->mo_device, argv[optind], sizeof(mop->mo_device));
00592 
00593                 /* Followed by optional vdevs */
00594                 if (optind < argc - 1)
00595                         mop->mo_pool_vdevs = (char **) &argv[optind + 1];
00596         }
00597 
00598         return 0;
00599 }
00600 
00601 int main(int argc, char *const argv[])
00602 {
00603         struct mkfs_opts mop;
00604         struct lustre_disk_data *ldd = &mop.mo_ldd;
00605         char *mountopts = NULL;
00606         char wanted_mountopts[512] = "";
00607         unsigned mount_type;
00608         int ret = 0;
00609         int ret2 = 0;
00610 
00611         progname = strrchr(argv[0], '/');
00612         if (progname != NULL)
00613                 progname++;
00614         else
00615                 progname = argv[0];
00616 
00617         if ((argc < 2) || (argv[argc - 1][0] == '-')) {
00618                 usage(stderr);
00619                 return EINVAL;
00620         }
00621 
00622         memset(&mop, 0, sizeof(mop));
00623         set_defaults(&mop);
00624 
00625         /* device is last arg */
00626         strscpy(mop.mo_device, argv[argc - 1], sizeof(mop.mo_device));
00627 
00628         ret = osd_init();
00629         if (ret != 0)
00630                 return ret;
00631 
00632 #ifdef TUNEFS
00633         /* For tunefs, we must read in the old values before parsing any
00634            new ones. */
00635 
00636         /* Check whether the disk has already been formatted by mkfs.lustre */
00637         ret = osd_is_lustre(mop.mo_device, &mount_type);
00638         if (ret == 0) {
00639                 fatal();
00640                 fprintf(stderr, "Device %s has not been formatted with "
00641                         "mkfs.lustre\n", mop.mo_device);
00642                 ret = ENODEV;
00643                 goto out;
00644         }
00645         ldd->ldd_mount_type = mount_type;
00646 
00647         ret = osd_read_ldd(mop.mo_device, ldd);
00648         if (ret != 0) {
00649                 fatal();
00650                 fprintf(stderr, "Failed to read previous Lustre data from %s "
00651                         "(%d)\n", mop.mo_device, ret);
00652                 goto out;
00653         }
00654 
00655         ldd->ldd_flags &= ~(LDD_F_WRITECONF | LDD_F_VIRGIN);
00656 
00657         /* svname of the form lustre:OST1234 means never registered */
00658         ret = strlen(ldd->ldd_svname);
00659         if (ldd->ldd_svname[ret - 8] == ':') {
00660                 ldd->ldd_svname[ret - 8] = '-';
00661                 ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_VIRGIN;
00662         } else if (ldd->ldd_svname[ret - 8] == '=') {
00663                 ldd->ldd_svname[ret - 8] = '-';
00664                 ldd->ldd_flags |= LDD_F_WRITECONF;
00665         }
00666 
00667         if (strstr(ldd->ldd_params, PARAM_MGSNODE))
00668                 mop.mo_mgs_failnodes++;
00669 
00670         if (verbose > 0)
00671                 print_ldd("Read previous values", ldd);
00672 #endif /* TUNEFS */
00673 
00674         ret = parse_opts(argc, argv, &mop, &mountopts);
00675         if (ret != 0 || version)
00676                 goto out;
00677 
00678         if (!IS_MDT(ldd) && !IS_OST(ldd) && !IS_MGS(ldd)) {
00679                 fatal();
00680                 fprintf(stderr, "must set target type: MDT,OST,MGS\n");
00681                 ret = EINVAL;
00682                 goto out;
00683         }
00684 
00685         if (((IS_MDT(ldd) || IS_MGS(ldd))) && IS_OST(ldd)) {
00686                 fatal();
00687                 fprintf(stderr, "OST type is exclusive with MDT,MGS\n");
00688                 ret = EINVAL;
00689                 goto out;
00690         }
00691 
00692         /* Stand alone MGS doesn't need an index */
00693         if (!IS_MDT(ldd) && IS_MGS(ldd)) {
00694 #ifndef TUNEFS
00695                 /* But if --index was specified flag an error */
00696                 if (!(ldd->ldd_flags & LDD_F_NEED_INDEX)) {
00697                         badopt("index", "MDT,OST");
00698                         goto out;
00699                 }
00700 #endif
00701                 ldd->ldd_flags &= ~LDD_F_NEED_INDEX;
00702         }
00703 
00704         if ((ldd->ldd_flags & (LDD_F_NEED_INDEX | LDD_F_UPGRADE14)) ==
00705             (LDD_F_NEED_INDEX | LDD_F_UPGRADE14)) {
00706                 fatal();
00707                 fprintf(stderr, "Can't find the target index, "
00708                 "specify with --index\n");
00709                 ret = EINVAL;
00710                 goto out;
00711         }
00712 
00713         if (ldd->ldd_flags & LDD_F_NEED_INDEX)
00714                 fprintf(stderr, "warning: %s: for Lustre 2.4 and later, the "
00715                         "target index must be specified with --index\n",
00716                         mop.mo_device);
00717 
00718         /* If no index is supplied for MDT by default set index to zero */
00719         if (IS_MDT(ldd) && (ldd->ldd_svindex == INDEX_UNASSIGNED)) {
00720                 ldd->ldd_flags &= ~LDD_F_NEED_INDEX;
00721                 ldd->ldd_svindex = 0;
00722         }
00723         if (!IS_MGS(ldd) && (mop.mo_mgs_failnodes == 0)) {
00724                 fatal();
00725                 if (IS_MDT(ldd))
00726                         fprintf(stderr, "Must specify --mgs or --mgsnode\n");
00727                 else
00728                         fprintf(stderr, "Must specify --mgsnode\n");
00729                 ret = EINVAL;
00730                 goto out;
00731         }
00732         if ((IS_MDT(ldd) || IS_OST(ldd)) && ldd->ldd_fsname[0] == '\0') {
00733                 fatal();
00734                 fprintf(stderr, "Must specify --fsname for MDT/OST device\n");
00735                 ret = EINVAL;
00736                 goto out;
00737         }
00738 
00739         /* These are the permanent mount options (always included) */
00740         ret = osd_prepare_lustre(&mop,
00741                                  wanted_mountopts, sizeof(wanted_mountopts));
00742         if (ret != 0) {
00743                 fatal();
00744                 fprintf(stderr, "unable to prepare backend (%d)\n", ret);
00745                 goto out;
00746         }
00747 
00748         if (mountopts) {
00749                 trim_mountfsoptions(mountopts);
00750                 if (check_mountfsoptions(mountopts, wanted_mountopts)) {
00751                         ret = EINVAL;
00752                         goto out;
00753                 }
00754                 snprintf(ldd->ldd_mount_opts, sizeof(ldd->ldd_mount_opts),
00755                          "%s", mountopts);
00756         } else {
00757 #ifdef TUNEFS
00758                 if (ldd->ldd_mount_opts[0] == 0)
00759                 /* use the defaults unless old opts exist */
00760 #endif
00761                 {
00762                         snprintf(ldd->ldd_mount_opts,
00763                                  sizeof(ldd->ldd_mount_opts),
00764                                  "%s", wanted_mountopts);
00765                         trim_mountfsoptions(ldd->ldd_mount_opts);
00766                 }
00767         }
00768 
00769         ret = osd_fix_mountopts(&mop, ldd->ldd_mount_opts,
00770                                 sizeof(ldd->ldd_mount_opts));
00771         if (ret != 0) {
00772                 fatal();
00773                 fprintf(stderr, "unable to fix mountfsoptions (%d)\n", ret);
00774                 goto out;
00775         }
00776 
00777         server_make_name(ldd->ldd_flags, ldd->ldd_svindex,
00778                          ldd->ldd_fsname, ldd->ldd_svname);
00779 
00780         if (verbose >= 0)
00781                 print_ldd("Permanent disk data", ldd);
00782 
00783         if (print_only) {
00784                 printf("exiting before disk write.\n");
00785                 goto out;
00786         }
00787 
00788         if (check_mtab_entry(mop.mo_device, mop.mo_device, NULL, NULL))
00789                 return(EEXIST);
00790 
00791         /* Create the loopback file */
00792         if (mop.mo_flags & MO_IS_LOOP) {
00793                 ret = access(mop.mo_device, F_OK);
00794                 if (ret != 0)
00795                         ret = errno;
00796 
00797 #ifndef TUNEFS
00798                 /* Reformat the loopback file */
00799                 if (ret != 0 || (mop.mo_flags & MO_FORCEFORMAT)) {
00800                         ret = loop_format(&mop);
00801                         if (ret != 0)
00802                                 goto out;
00803                 }
00804 #endif
00805                 if (ret == 0)
00806                         ret = loop_setup(&mop);
00807                 if (ret != 0) {
00808                         fatal();
00809                         fprintf(stderr, "Loop device setup for %s failed: %s\n",
00810                                         mop.mo_device, strerror(ret));
00811                         goto out;
00812                 }
00813         }
00814 
00815 #ifndef TUNEFS
00816         /* Check whether the disk has already been formatted by mkfs.lustre */
00817         if (!(mop.mo_flags & MO_FORCEFORMAT)) {
00818                 ret = osd_is_lustre(mop.mo_device, &mount_type);
00819                 if (ret != 0) {
00820                         fatal();
00821                         fprintf(stderr, "Device %s was previously formatted "
00822                                 "for lustre. Use --reformat to reformat it, "
00823                                 "or tunefs.lustre to modify.\n",
00824                                 mop.mo_device);
00825                         goto out;
00826                 }
00827         }
00828 
00829         /* Format the backing filesystem */
00830         ret = osd_make_lustre(&mop);
00831         if (ret != 0) {
00832                 fatal();
00833                 fprintf(stderr, "mkfs failed %d\n", ret);
00834                 goto out;
00835         }
00836 #else /* !TUNEFS */
00837         /* update svname with '=' to refresh config */
00838         if (ldd->ldd_flags & LDD_F_WRITECONF) {
00839                 struct mount_opts opts;
00840                 opts.mo_ldd = *ldd;
00841                 opts.mo_source = mop.mo_device;
00842                 (void) osd_label_lustre(&opts);
00843         }
00844 
00845         /* Enable quota accounting */
00846         if (mop.mo_flags & MO_QUOTA) {
00847                 ret = osd_enable_quota(&mop);
00848                 goto out;
00849         }
00850 #endif /* !TUNEFS */
00851 
00852         /* Write our config files */
00853         ret = osd_write_ldd(&mop);
00854         if (ret != 0) {
00855                 fatal();
00856                 fprintf(stderr, "failed to write local files\n");
00857                 goto out;
00858         }
00859 
00860 out:
00861         osd_fini();
00862         ret2 = loop_cleanup(&mop);
00863         if (ret == 0)
00864                 ret = ret2;
00865 
00866         /* Fix any crazy return values from system() */
00867         if (ret != 0 && ((ret & 255) == 0))
00868                 return 1;
00869 
00870         if (ret != 0)
00871                 verrprint("%s: exiting with %d (%s)\n",
00872                           progname, ret, strerror(ret));
00873         return ret;
00874 }
